title: Sitetool Details
description: Data that is collected by sitetools like chatbot,survey ..etc.

xdm:name.Title: Name
xdm:name.description: Name of the site tool like chatbot, survey ..etc.

xdm:section.Title: Section
xdm:section.description: Section of the site tool like main , sub.

xdm:actor.Title: Actor.
xdm:actor.description: A person/member who did the action.

xdm:actorID.Title: Actor ID
xdm:actorID.description: Reference to the actor who could be a member,practionner or a relatedperson.

xdm:dataGatheringEvent.Title: Data Gathering Event
xdm:dataGatheringEvent.description: Indicates if this event is a data gathering event and the other event details.

xdm:isTrue.Title: Is True
xdm:isTrue.description: Indicates if this event is a data gathering event like quiz,survey, poll.

xdm:data.Title: Data
xdm:data.description: Data that is collected and submitted as part of quiz,survey or poll submit event.

xdm:question.Title: Question
xdm:question.description: Question of for which the response is collected.

xdm:score.Title: Score
xdm:score.description: Score secured by the actor based on event responses.

xdm:attachments.Title: Attachments
xdm:attachments.description: Attachments exchanged as part of this event.

xdm:isKeyEvent.Title: Is Key Event
xdm:isKeyEvent.description: Indicates if this event is a key event.
